version_description:
- Print Receipts with a Bluetooth Printer
- Improved Login Experience (Facebook, Google, and Form)

We're always making improvements to Kyte. To make sure you don't miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

We're continually improving Kyte so that you and your customers can have an even better checkout experience. This release includes:
- Log in improvement;
- Account Reset;
- Bug fixes.

New Feature:
- Online Catalog: Your products on the web for everyone to see.
- Bug Fixes.

We thought about writing a really cool release note to tell you about our most-awaited feature ever, but why not play Hangman instead?
__________
| |
| 0
| /|\
| /
|
INV_NTOR_ M_N_G_M_NT

You've guessed it! You can now manage your inventory with Kyte.

Here's what you'll be able to do with our new Inventory Management system:

- Track the stock on hand for each product.
- Follow the stock movement (quantities added, items sold, returned or removed).
- Set a minimum stock level.
- Know when a product is running out of stock straight from the checkout screen.
- Notice right from the checkout screen when a product is running low or is out of stock.

Our team spent the last few months developing an inventory management system that is based on our core principles: simple, yet powerful! Now you and your staff will have even more control over day to day activities.

BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE:

1. Import Customers: It is now possible to import the list of contacts from your phonebook into Kyte.

2. Duplicate receipt: Automatically print duplicate receipts to be used as delivery or kitchen order tickets.

3. Receipt Notes: Add notes, observations or instructions to your receipts.

4. Profits Display: Transaction details now include the profit made for each sale.

5. Decimal parts: Some of you have told us that in some parts of the world the decimals are not used, so we’ve added the option to remove them.

6. Fixes and improvements: We’ve done some housekeeping. We squashed bugs, cleaned up the code, and made some small-but-mighty improvements.

By the way, if you’re enjoying Kyte POS, please spread the word and leave us a review! If you’ve got suggestions or need any help, please contact us directly at help@kytepos.com
We’ve done some housekeeping. We squashed bugs, cleaned up the code, and made some small-but-mighty improvements.

Hey there, great news: we’ve made improvements to Kyte :)

You can now customize your receipt with a header and footer as well as include information about the customer. We’ve also implemented flat tax so that every sale has the same tax rate regardless of the amount.

**IMPROVEMENTS**
- Added Receipt header
- Added Receipt footer
- Added customer information to the receipt
- Implemented flat tax rate.

New Order Management System!

- Order Status: You can now set order status as pending or confirmed in order to move inventory or not.

- List of Orders: View all orders on a single screen and filter them based on status

- Some users were experiencing problems creating a password with Google/Facebook accounts. We’ve fixed that! We’ve also fixed some other minor bugs and improved the app performance.

EXCITING NEW FEATURES ALERT!

- Barcoding: Use your phone camera to assign a barcode to products and ring up items.

- Export Reports: Export data from sales, products, and customers to CSV so that you can work with them on Excel or Google Spreadsheets.

Our team of exterminators got rid of some bugs and made it possible for our developers to implement some performance improvements to give you an even better retail experience.

By the way, if you happen to come across any of those pesky bugs or would like to give us some feedback, you can reach us at help@kytepos.com.

EXCITING NEW FEATURES ALERT!

- Barcoding: Use your phone camera to assign a barcode to products and ring up items.

- Export Reports: Export data from sales, products, and customers to CSV so that you can work with them on Excel or Google Spreadsheets.

Our team of exterminators got rid of some bugs and made it possible for our developers to implement some performance improvements to give you an even better retail experience.

By the way, if you happen to come across any of those pesky bugs or would like to give us some feedback, you can reach us at help@kytepos.com.

We’ve got some GREAT new features fresh off the oven!


Image Crop - It’s finally here. Hooray! You can now crop your product pics so that they look nice both in your inventory as well as your Product Catalog.

Clone Products - One of the top requested items was the ability to duplicate a product, so we fast tracked that feature and it is now live!

Barcode Reader Enhancement - Now every time the scanner reads an unassigned barcode a message will pop up asking you’d like to add that product to inventory

Data Import - You can know send us CSV file of your inventory and customers and we will upload them to Kyte.

Online Orders is finally here.
The long-awaited feature brings some new and exciting changes:

- Orders: Customers can now place orders directly from your Product Catalog.
- Accounts: Customers create an account before they place an order and their information is automatically synced with Kyte.
- Notifications: You’ll be notified every time an order is placed you are always in the know.

Online Orders is finally here.

The long-awaited feature brings some new and exciting changes:

- Orders: Customers can now place orders directly from your Product Catalog.
- Accounts: Customers create an account before they place an order and their information is automatically synced with Kyte.
- Notifications: You’ll be notified every time an order is placed you are always in the know.

This is a MAJOR update with LOTS of improvements.

Let's start with what's new:

- Add discount on items and total
- Change item price during checkout
- Create products with no price

Now on to the improvements:

- Search product code in the stock tab
- Profits only are shown to admins
- Faster sync and usability

And finally the much-needed fixes:

- Fixed excessive data consumption
- Fixed contact creation issues
- And many other smaller (but important) fixes

We got another quality update for you.

- Image sync fix
- Added delivery fee option
- Changed transaction history default settings
- Only admin can change tax settings
- Add discount to confirmed orders

Bug fixes:
- Amount difference between Transactions and Analytics
- Erase data affecting all users
- Category name change not affecting catalog

Help Center:

- New layout
- Search improvements
- Included virtual assistant;
- Kyte Community

This new release is focused on performance and overall feature quality. This is what we developed:

What's new:

- Subscribe to Kyte PRO with Google Pay.
- Compatibility with 64bit devices.

What's better:

- Address line 2 now shows in the receipt
- Display of products with price over 999.999
- Option to enter area code from other countries

What's fixed:

- Profit analytics error.
- Duplicate contacts from phone error.
- Receipts by email error.

Questions or suggestions? https://kyteapp.mn.co

What's new:

- Receipts in PDF
- Sort products by A-Z

Improvements:

- Huge performance upgrade
- Many receipt adjustments including price per unit, spacing, currency symbol and discount per unit
- Barcode scanner now beeps
- Removed the decimal points from the Catalog for currencies that require them

Fixes:

- SumUp integration
- There were data discrepancies for the revenue and payment methods analytics
- We squashed a bug that was making it really hard for some people to create an account

What’s new:

- Facebook and Instagram integration: Connect your catalog to Facebook and Instagram to begin showcasing your products on these platforms.
- Paypal: Customers can now subscribe to Kyte PRO using the service.

What we improved:

- Scroll adjustment;
- Currency symbol changes;
- Help button in the Login screen;

What we fixed:

- Barcode Scanner;
- Transaction filter save;
- Export report fix.

What’s new:

- Facebook and Instagram integration: Connect your catalog to Facebook and Instagram to begin showcasing your products on these platforms.
- Paypal: Customers can now subscribe to Kyte PRO using the service.

What we improved:

- Scroll adjustment;
- Currency symbol changes;
- Help button in the Login screen;

What we fixed:

- Barcode Scanner;
- Transaction filter save;
- Export report fix.

- Paypal: Customers can now subscribe to Kyte PRO using the service.

End of the year is right around the corner, but that doesn’t mean we won’t bring you another awesome update.

What’s new:

- We’ve improved the checkout flow to bring more efficiency and speed to the selling process
- Now every time there’s a new order they’ll show up right on the screen
- Product codes are now displayed in the product list view

Improvements:

- Reports now show quantity of items sold
- Reports also show current stock cost

And MANY other fixes. Hope you enjoy.

End of the year is right around the corner, but that doesn’t mean we won’t bring you another awesome update.

What’s new:

- We’ve improved the checkout flow to bring more efficiency and speed to the selling process
- Now every time there’s a new order they’ll show up right on the screen
- Product codes are now displayed in the product list view

Improvements:

- Reports now show quantity of items sold
- Reports also show current stock cost

And MANY other fixes. Hope you enjoy.

We’ve got great news for you and your business!

Boost sales by giving your customer the flexibility to shop with you now and pay later.

With this new feature you can:

1. Offer the customers you trust the option to buy now and pay later;
2. Track receivables and payments at all times with analytics and a new transaction history.

But wait! There’s more.

You can also add STORE CREDITS to a customer account to increase returning business.

We've tightened some loose ends and smoothed out a few rough patches to keep the Kyte in shape. Here's what we've tinkered with:

- On Account
- Cloned product
- Online Catalog tax
- Sales taxes
- Receipt
- Transactions
- Currency symbol issues
- Product ranking

Here's what's improved:

- Search customers by phone number
- More digits after the decimal point for fractioned products.

Drop questions and suggestions to help@kyteapp.com

- On Account
- Cloned product

- Sales taxes

- Transactions

- Product ranking

- More digits after the decimal point for fractioned products.

Drop questions and suggestions to help@kyteapp.com

Drop questions and suggestions to help@kyteapp.com

Here’s what’s new for this update:

- A new Support System so that we can assist you better than ever.
- Inventory Totals: This includes Total Cost, Purchase Cost and a sum of Inventory Levels.
- Layout Improvements; We’ve also made some minor but important layout improvements to give you an even better in app experience.

Here’s what’s new for this update:

- A new Support System so that we can assist you better than ever.
- Inventory Totals: This includes Total Cost, Purchase Cost and a sum of Inventory Levels.
- Layout Improvements; We’ve also made some minor but important layout improvements to give you an even better in app experience.

ANNOUNCEMENT

We're all worried about how this health crisis may impact our businesses and we want to do everything in our power to help. Our Online Ordering & Delivery System can be useful for sales when you can't be in the same room as your customers, so we are making it part of the FREE plan in this time of need.

This version also includes:
- Online Catalog Improvements.
- Analytics-related bug fixes.
- Payment-related issues were also fixed.

- Transaction and orders history performance improvement. Users with a large number of sales will benefit a lot from this update.
- New email onboarding: learning to use Kyte or training your staff members is now much easier.
- New address search system.
- Currency search by country.
- And many other small improvements and fixes.

We're introducing new ways to delight your guests online and drive your business forward.

- Custom order status: Better organize your orders and improve communication with customers. You can now create custom status like "Preparing order" or "Ready for delivery".

- Guest checkout: A brand-new frictionless way for your customers to order online.

- Bugs were squashed and tweaks were made to improve the overall performance.

More improvements to help you sell online and offline during the pandemic:

- List products as ON SALE
- Options to show products out of stock in the catalog
- Shortcut to add notes to orders
- Catalog layout improvements.
- Worked on performance to ensure your catalog is always online
- Fixed the way unit prices were displayed on the receipt.

More improvements to help you sell online and offline during the pandemic:

- List products as ON SALE
- Options to show products out of stock in the catalog
- Shortcut to add notes to orders
- Catalog layout improvements.
- Worked on performance to ensure your catalog is always online
- Fixed the way unit prices were displayed on the receipt.

This update focuses on bringing improved catalog and app performance as well as some minor fixes. We're currently working on bringing you great features that will help you boost online sales. Stay tuned!

New features:

Quick order management: now when you open an order notification a modal will open with a summary and editing button.

Sales on Social Media: The price of items on sale will now be displayed on Facebook and Instagram.

New login option with Apple ID.

Fixes and improvements:

Fixed a bug related to reports with items sold by weight or length.
Fixed the math behind itens with "negative profit”.
And many other performance improvements and technical bug fixes.
A new chat support system was implemented so that we can offer you an even better experience using Kyte.

What's new:
You can now customize your kyte.site domain.
We created a new PAID status for orders.
There's also a new online catalog wizard and setup with ID input.
And a new receipt configuration and quick edit system.

What's improved:
Status and user filter are much better now.
Updated our Privacy policy and Terms of Conditions. Check it out!

What's fixed:
We fixed many tiny issues that should give you a much better user experience.

What's new:
On this version we worked hard to fix issues and to create the base structure for upcoming improvements. Stay tuned!

What's improved:
The "Slide to confirm" button is now super effective and responsive, but still as fun as ever.

What's fixed:
Products no longer appear out of stock when the stock control is not enabled.
The "missing" transactions in Chile and Paraguay have been recovered. Thank you so much for sticking with us until this update!

What's new:
On this version we continued working on the base structure for upcoming improvements. It's looking good!

What's improved:
Keeping our app international is a big challenge so we took our time to go over the app's translation and improve it. On the way we also fixed some design mishaps.

What's fixed:
First time Kyters no longer get incorrect expiration dates of their PRO license.

What's new:
To our newly arrived Kyters, a helper to guide you on getting your business up and running online.

What's improved:
Slide down the screen on the Stock tab in the Products menu to update the numbers.

What's fixed:
Stock was counting every tap and duplicating the amount of products, now it no longer responds nervous fingers.
The logo and the customer details are back on the PDF. And the translation was corrected.

This is the last update of the year and it is a good one.

New Catalog Domain: Get a free your-store.kyte.site domain. The old kyte.site/your-store will redirect to the new one. We made the switch to enable more social selling features.

Facebook Catalog and Instagram Shopping: The new catalog feed allows you to sell on Instagram and Facebook. You can find the tutorials on how to do the integration on our Help Center.

What's new:
- List of selectable payment methods during the online ordering operation: the customer will place the order picking the preferred payment method, and informing how much they'll need for change in case of payment in cash.
What's improved:
- Small but important improvements in the background to enhance the overall performance and experience.
What's fixed:
- Small but important corrections in the background to enhance the overall performance and experience.

What's new:
- At the request of (all) users, we included more image slots per product on the catalog. We thank you all for the patience!
- You can now highlight your products, just add a STAR and they will ascend to the top of the list in the catalog and at Checkout in the app.

What's fixed:
- We are no longer integrated with SumUp outside of Brazil but the card readers remain in use and the sales can be completed manually on the app.
- In order to offer greater stability to the catalog, every change and update made will be uploaded together so they can take up to 5 minutes to be completed.

What's new:
We integrated the app with Google Shopping to expand the online presence of your business and boost your sales.
The Orders menu will remain active even if there are no new orders. Updates will appear in the green badge on the left of the menu.

What's improved:
We added a tracker to better understand sign-in failures on Kyte accounts. Do not worry as it is an internal process and won't affect the use of the app.

What's improved:
- We've added a tool that organizes the errors occuring on the app on a daily basis to better focus our corrections.
- The catalog synch service was improved and with it the speed which the data is loaded and updated.
- We increased the number of tests so that the final versions are flawless.

This version brings corrections of errors in updating Business Information, users being created with no name and unable to reset passwords, incorrect payment methods displayed in receipt sent by email and shown in orders not yet completed as sales, faulty filter in Analytics and on the Stock tab of the Products menu, users without permission accessing reports and creating new products directly on the cart, sales being completed with a total higher than the amount available in Store Credit.

We've optmized the push notifications service so you won't experience any lag to receive the notification when the customer places the order.
We've also fixed a bug that prevented you to return to the order list when you edited an order by opening it through its notification message.

This version has several minor bug fixes that have accumulated in the last few months. These include:
- We implemented translations that were missing
- We fixed the problem when importing contacts from the phone, as not all names were saved
- We corrected the navigation using the back button
- The problem when saving items from code reader was also corrected
- CSV reports now support all languages
- Outdated customer balance data, when accessing it for the transaction
Other minor fixes.
